items.title: Water Treatment Plant Simulator
items.blurb: Scenario-based operator training simulator for conventional surface water treatment.
items.description: Interactive game covering coagulation, filtration, disinfection, and process upsets — built for operator decision-making practice.

items.title: California Water Atlas — Digital Twin
items.blurb: Interactive digital twin mapping California's water infrastructure and flow networks.
items.description: Visualization project connecting source water, conveyance, treatment, and distribution across California's complex water system.

_guide: Each item should include: id, title, blurb, description, tag, status, featured, url. Thumbnail is optional.
